question: Tolong jelaskan secara singkat dan jelas pengertian dari report teks

answers.answer:
Definition of Report
Report is a text which presents information about something, as it is. It is as a result of systematic observation and analysis

Generic Structure of Report
1. General classification: Stating classification of general aspect of thing; animal, public place, plant, etc which will be discussed in general
2. Description: Describing the thing which will be discussed in detail; part per part , customs or deed for living creature and usage for materials

Language Feature of Report
• Introducing group or general aspect
• Using conditional logical connection; when, so, etc
• Using simple present tense
report text adalah salah satu jenis teks yang masuk kategori " factual text "

related_questions.question: Tolong Beri Penjelasan Tentang Word Order Dengan Rinci

answers.answer: Word order atau tata urut kata merupakan cara untuk menyusun kata – kata dalam urutan atau susunan yang tepat dan benar.

Word order adalah susunan kata-kata dalam kalimat, artinya bahwa cara kita menempatkan setiap kata itu haruslah sesuai dengan fungsinya dalam membentuk suatu kalimat. Caranya dengan mengetahui dan menghafal rumus atau pola baku.
Contoh:
'' Sebuah mobil mewah baru buatan Amerika Serikat '' diterjemahkan menjadi " A new American car ".

Present perfect adalah tenses yang menyatakan bahwa kejadian sudah dilakukan.
Rumus : S + Have/Has(Auxiliary) + V3
Misal : I have done my homework
Unsur : I = Subject
Have = Aux/Have/Has
Done = V3
Homework = Object
Umumnya ditambahkan kata Since + Time
Jadi : I have done my homework since this morning

present perfect itu berhubungan dengan kejadian yang sudah selesai. kata kuncinya sih ada kata "sudah", "baru saja", dsb.

misalkan "saya sudah mengerjakan PR", atau i have done my homework

related_questions.question: tolong translate ke dalam bahasa indonesia, kata-kata dibawah ini... Salam perkenalan, selamat bergabung dengan perusahaan kami. Mari kita berjuang sama-sama untuk kemajuan perusahaan dan kesejahteraan para karyawan dan karyawati diperusahaan kita. Dan mari kita sama-sama mempersiapkan tanggungjawab atas kemajuan perusahaan ini.

answers.answer:
Salam perkenalan, selamat bergabung dengan perusahaan kami. Mari kita berjuang sama-sama untuk kemajuan perusahaan dan kesejahteraan para karyawan dan karyawati diperusahaan kita. Dan mari kita sama-sama mempersiapkan tanggungjawab atas kemajuan perusahaan ini.

related_questions.question:

2. People say that Arthur is very rich
3. People say that he has 22 children

answers.answer:
1. It is said that many people are homeless after floods
-- ini udah pasif ya?

2. People say that Arthur is very rich

related_questions.question:
Carilah posisi kata yang tidak tepat yang digaris bawahi dan jelaskan mengapa kata itu tidak tepat disertai alasannya. soal :    1. a survey indicates that 'really shows' have attracted the higher proportion of tv viewers since the end of the last quarter of 2008.
2. the giant panda whose is also know as the panda bear of the bamboo panda is almost extinct because the bamboo forests where it lives are destroyed.
3. we are a leasing company. as many as 65% of our employees are posted in the marketing division. most of them are smart, talented, good look young men, who do not mind working ten hours a day, six days a week.
4. A : i heard that you will go camping after the final test. will i go with you ? 
B : yes, but you should get permission from your parents.
5. A : what does justin bieber like ?
B : he is handsome. he has good voice.
A : is that why so many girls like him so much ?
B : we can't help it.
buat kalimat pujian + responnya tentang memuji keindahan alam, memuji mother, father, granpa/ma, teacher, brother and sister, friend, best friend pet, your self

answers.answer:

Mom : Ok , thankyou my sweetheart, i love you.

related_questions.question:
Combine the sentences using : Too, so, or either and neither    1. Dogs can't eat vegetables. Cats can't eat vegetables
2. We haven't eaten yet. Father hasn't yet
3. Mitha is not seventeen years old. I am not seventeen years old

Jawabannya yang Jelas ya :)

answers.answer:
1. Dogs can't eat vegetables. Neither can cats
2. We haven't eaten yet. Father hasn't either
3. Mitha is not seventeen years old. I am not either

setau aku begitu aja sih udah betul. mudah-mudahan membantu ya:)
